dmx: - ive been waiting  spent nights out chasing for your love but its going down tonight its going down ive been waiting spent nights out chasing for your love but its going down tonight its going down  what did you think you would do what did you think youd say after i told you how i was feeling never thought id see this day i always kept dreaming never let failure hurt my heart i knew that soon youd see better all i could do is hope and pray
